##Initialisation

```{r}
library(CreDating)
library(ape)
set.seed(0)
phy <- simdatedtree(nsam = 20, dateroot = 2000)
dates = leafDates(phy)
obsphy=simobsphy(phy, rate=10,model='gamma')
res=roottotip(obsphy,dates)
```

##Analysis

We run CreDating with rate equal to 5 and 10, and compare models:

```{r}
res =credate(obsphy,dates,initRate = 20,updateRate = F)
res2=credate(obsphy,dates,initRate = 10,updateRate = F)
modelcompare(res,res2)
```
